text.headline: War and Peace Character Map
text.text: Explore the progression of Tolstoy's masterpiece, chapter by chapter. A spoil-as-you-go guide to keep track of the maze of characters

text.headline: Book One: Introduction
text.text: Introduction to the main characters and the social and political landscape of Russia in 1805.

text.headline: Chapter 1: Anna Pavlovna's Reception
text.text: Anna Pavlovna hosts a soirée where Pierre Bezukhov and Prince Andrei Bolkonsky are introduced.

text.headline: Chapter 2: Pierre's Inheritance
text.text: Pierre learns of his inheritance and the responsibilities it entails.

text.headline: Chapter 3: Prince Andrei's Disillusionment
text.text: Prince Andrei becomes disillusioned with society and seeks a more meaningful life.

text.headline: Chapter 4: Natasha Rostova's Debut
text.text: Natasha Rostova makes her debut in society, attracting the attention of several suitors.

text.headline: Chapter 5: Pierre's Marriage
text.text: Pierre marries Hélène Kuragin, a decision that leads to personal turmoil.

text.headline: Chapter 6: Prince Andrei's Return
text.text: Prince Andrei returns to Russia, bringing news of the impending war with Napoleon.

text.headline: Chapter 7: Battle of Austerlitz
text.text: The Russian army faces defeat at the Battle of Austerlitz, leading to significant changes in the characters' lives.
